mapper.insert: insert into admin (a_id, a_name, a_sex, u_id, a_state, a_aTcity, a_addres, a_pass, a_phoneNumb, a_remarks) values (#{aId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aAtcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aAddres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPhonenumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin set a_name = #{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_sex = #{aSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_state = #{aState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_aTcity = #{aAtcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_addres = #{aAddres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_pass = #{aPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_phoneNumb = #{aPhonenumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_remarks = #{aRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a_id, a_name, a_sex, u_id, a_state, a_aTcity, a_addres, a_pass, a_phoneNumb, a_remarks from admin where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select a_id, a_name, a_sex, u_id, a_state, a_aTcity, a_addres, a_pass, a_phoneNumb, a_remarks from admin
